text:
[Verse]
Stars above sparkle bright
Magic in the air tonight
Moonlight dances on the sea
Dreams as far as eyes can see

[Verse 2]
Whispers of a summer breeze
Rustling gently through the trees
Feel the magic touch your skin
Let this night of dreams begin

[Chorus]
Magic in the air
Feel it everywhere
Hearts are light and free
Where we want to be

[Verse 3]
Fireflies are glowing bright
Guiding us through this night
Hold my hand and close your eyes
Journey to where stars collide

[Bridge]
Melodies we softly hum
In this night so full of fun
Every step a dance so rare
Moments that we'll always share

[Chorus]
Magic in the air
Feel it everywhere
Hearts are light and free
Where we want to be
title: Magic in the Air
